title: The Sheol
description: THE SHEOL - the first book in The Wanderer Trilogy.CAN A KILLER EVER TRULY QUIT?Being a trained killer, Kala can handle most things the world throws at her. However, when she murders her fiance, Kala's life is thrown into chaos. Forced to leave everything behind, she runs from city to city, in fear of her psychotic boss who is seeking her death. If that wasn't enough, she also has to cope with the re-appearance of her dead fiance who is struggling to keep a hold on his sanity as he strives for revenge.
author: Mia Hoddell
